navigation.profileInfo: Check your reservations and get your QR-code
navigation.informationInfo: Just can't get a hang of this application? Then definitely check out our help page!
navigation.dashboardInfo: Find your ideal study location in our application

alert.title: [FRIDAY DECEMBER 11th, RESERVATIONS AT DIFFERENT TIMES]
alert.p1: Reservations will take place at 19:00, 19:30 and 20:00 depending on the location. Be sure to check in advance when the reservations will open (see symbol).
alert.p2: We apologize again for the inconvenience. The interest for study places is bigger than we predicted, our server could not handle this load. We wish everyone the best of luck. If you are looking for support, make sure to check the following website:

warningDialog.body: The opening duration of (at least) one of the created calendar periods is not divisable by the Reservable Timeslot-duration. finishScanningModal.title: Finish scanning
finishScanningModal.message1: If you finish scanning this study room, all reservations that were not explicitly scanned as attended/absent will be set as absent.
finishScanningModal.message2: This means that all students that were not scanned, lose their spot for this timeslot.
finishScanningModal.message3: If an absent student later this timeslot does show up, and there are still spots free, you can still set the student as attended by scanning him/her.

scanningErrorModal.message: Something went wrong while scanning. The attendance/absence was not registered correctly. Are you trying to change attendance from absent to present in a full timeslot? This reservation was removed and the seat is now reserved by someone else.

conditions.li1: Your password must include at least one capital
conditions.li2: Your password must include at least one number
conditions.li3: The minimum length of your password is 8 characters

form.otherErrorOnUpdating: Something went wrong while updating your new password

overview.title: Profile Overview
overview.qrcode: You can show this QR code at the scanning desk of your study room. If scanned successfully, your attendance will be registered.

information.1: When you have more than 100 penalty points, you are not allowed to make reservations.
information.2: Each week, the weight of received penalty points for misbehaviour decreases by 20% of the original amount of received points
information.3: In other words, the amount of points you receive will influence the total amount of penalty points for a period of 5 weeks.

li.1: Cancelling a reservation after 7 PM, the night before the date of reservation (starting at 15 points, increasing to 30 points an hour before opening)
li.2: Not showing up when you did make a reservation (50 points)
li.3: Keeping a seat occupied for yourself, or for someone else, by placing a bag/books/... on the seat
li.4: When you would really cross the line, an employee may blacklist you for reservation. You will get 100 points. These points do not decrease over time!

table.title: Overview of your penalty points
table.noPenalties: You have had no penalties so far. Very good!

scan.mobile-hint: Scanning works best when the barcode is aligned horizontally.
scan.handheld-hint: To use the handheld scanner, select the input box below. If scan is succesful, the user will pop to the top of the list.

scan.warn-unattended: Marking someone as unattended opens up the seat for reservation.
